home.tagline: Strategic branding, marketing, and digital product development for entrepreneurs ready to build impactful businesses.
home.introText: We believe every great business starts with a clear vision and strong foundation. At SIVRA, we transform ideas into thriving brands through strategic thinking, compelling design, and effective marketing systems. Whether you're just starting or ready to scale, we're here to guide you from concept to execution.
home.revolution: Your Brand. Your Vision. Our Expertise.
home.strategicBrandingDesc: Brand strategy, naming, visual identity, and positioning that connects
home.digitalProductsDesc: We create, launch, and help you sell digital products
home.fullSupportDesc: From concept to execution - we're with you every step
home.description: Founded by Anoosha Moshkelgosha, SIVRA helps entrepreneurs build brands with clarity, confidence, and purpose
home.slide1Subtitle: From templates to ebooks, we create products people love

services.title: Services
services.offeringDesc: Comprehensive services designed to take your business from concept to market. Whether you need full brand development or specific strategic support, we're here to help.
services.workWithUsDesc: Let's discuss your vision and create a custom strategy that brings your ideas to life. Book a free consultation to explore how SIVRA can support your journey.

brandStrategy.title: Brand Strategy & Identity
brandStrategy.description: Complete brand development including naming, positioning, visual identity, logo design, color palettes, typography, and brand guidelines. We create brands that resonate and connect.

digitalMarketing.title: Marketing & Growth
digitalMarketing.description: Social media strategy, content creation, paid advertising campaigns, sales funnels, email marketing, and growth systems designed to scale your business effectively.

digitalProducts.title: Digital Product Development
digitalProducts.description: We help you create, package, and sell digital products - from ebooks and courses to templates and guides. Or let us create and sell them on your behalf.

webDesign.title: Website & Design
webDesign.description: Custom website design and development, landing pages, packaging design, and all visual assets needed to present your brand professionally across all touchpoints.

story.title: Our Story
story.founderIntro: Founded by Anoosha Moshkelgosha, a CEO and Brand Strategist passionate about turning ideas into impactful businesses.
story.text: SIVRA began as a digital product brand and evolved into a full-service creative studio. What started with creating digital products grew into helping entrepreneurs build complete businesses - from brand strategy to marketing execution. Today, we're a founder-led team dedicated to empowering creators and small businesses with the tools, strategy, and support they need to succeed.
story.beginningDesc: Started as a digital product brand, creating resources for entrepreneurs
story.evolutionDesc: Expanded into full branding and marketing services for clients
story.expansionDesc: Built a comprehensive studio offering end-to-end business support
story.visionDesc: Empowering creative minds to build purpose-driven brands worldwide
story.missionText: We guide individuals, creators, and small businesses from concept to real-world impact through strategic branding, compelling visual design, digital product development, and effective marketing systems. We empower our clients to build with clarity, grow with confidence, and create with purpose.
story.visionText: We envision a world where creative minds and aspiring entrepreneurs have the tools, strategy, and support to turn ideas into impactful, purpose-driven brands. We believe in branding that goes beyond visuals - built on identity, emotion, and connection.
story.journeyDesc: Every client becomes part of our story. We're committed to your success and growth at every stage. Ready to turn your vision into reality?

contact.connectDesc: Ready to start your brand journey? Whether you have a clear vision or just a spark of an idea, we're here to help. Reach out through any channel below.
contact.workTogetherDesc: From concept to launch, we're committed to helping you build a brand that matters. Let's discuss how SIVRA can support your vision and bring your ideas to life.
contact.name: Name
contact.readyToStartDesc: Book a free consultation and let's discuss how we can help you build an impactful brand.

cta.ctaDescription: Whether you're starting from scratch or ready to elevate your existing business, SIVRA provides the strategy, design, and marketing support you need.
cta.testimonial: Working with SIVRA transformed our brand from an idea into a thriving business. The strategic approach and creative execution exceeded our expectations.

footer.description: SIVRA is a founder-led business studio helping entrepreneurs build impactful brands. From strategic branding to digital products, we turn ideas into businesses and visions into reality.
footer.newsletterDesc: Subscribe to our newsletter for insights, tips, and updates on building impactful brands.

skills.title: Personal Skills
skills.description: Strategic, creative, and deeply insightful, I specialize in building brands from the ground up. With a background in Psychology and MBA, I blend behavioral understanding with business strategy to craft high-converting offers, visual identities, and marketing systems. As the founder of SIVRA, I lead a cross-functional team delivering branding, content, digital product creation, and growth strategy for startups and creators ready to scale.
